product_name: Thule Podium Foot Half Pack - Pair
long_description: This Thule Podium Foot Half pack (pair) is a strong, tight-fitting system for mounting Thule bars on aerodynamic vehicles with fixed-point rack attachment locations. Designed exclusively for use with Thule Load Bars, sold separately. Can be locked in place using Thule One Key System lock cylinders, sold separately. The Thule Podium Foot Half pack is designed for use with custom-fitting Thule Fit Kits, sold separately. Refer to the Thule Online Fitting Guide to determine if this system will fit your car's make, model and year. Includes a set of 2; 4 Thule Podium feet are needed for a full car rack mounting system.
short_description: This Thule Podium Foot Half pack (pair) is a strong, tight-fitting system for mounting Thule bars on aerodynamic vehicles with fixed-point rack attachment locations.
